item.title: 大学英语 - 统考进阶（第三册）第一单元
item.description: 第一单元 家居生活 第一部分 基础阅读 课文 A 家具租赁业务 When John and Victoria Falls arrived in New York City for one-year stay, they did not bring very many things with them. They had planned either to live in a furnished apartment or to buy used furniture. But they soon learned about a new system
